original_text: Then they went south to Tyre, a strong city with walls around it. They went to all the towns of the Hivites and the Canaanites. Then they arrived at Beersheba in the south part of Judah.
korean_text: 두로 견고한 성에 이르고 히위 사람과 가나안 사람의 모든 성읍에 이르고 유다 남쪽으로 나와 브엘세바에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: Then they went south to Tyre
a strong city with walls around it
They went to all the towns of the Hivites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 히위 사람들의 성읍으로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: in the south part of Judah
